long_description: Share the ride on your favorite mellow off-road jaunts on the Cannondale Tandem 29er bike. It offers twice the fun with fast-rolling 29 in. wheels and a high-quality aluminum frame for two. Featuring smooth welds, light weight and attention to the smallest details, the frame of the Cannondale Tandem 29er is stiff, light and responsive with 2 riders. OPI one-piece, hollow, 3D forged fork with 1.5 in. steerer offers stable, secure, nimble and responsive handling. Shimano Acera shifters and rear derailleur perform smoothly as you shift through the 27-speed drivetrain, which is powered by Truvativ cranks. Magura MT2 hydraulic disc brakes use dual rotors to provide powerful braking. DT Swiss Tandem rims are outfitted with Kenda Small Block 8 tires to provide grippy, fast-rolling performance. Specs on the Cannondale Tandem 29er bike are subject to change.
